location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Diagram of Sitra Terminal Tank Link Up’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:581 x 881 mm, on sheet 996 x 1001 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Copy of a diagram compiled by the Bahrein Petroleum Company (BAPCO), enclosed in a letter no. P.Z. 398/35 dated 17 January 1935 (folios 41-42).Shows the terminal facilities including pipelines and valves which are described in a memorandum describing the installation of the BAPCO terminal on Sitrah Island, Bahrain (folios 43-49).Includes inset showing ‘Details of Valves, Relief Valves etc. on Main Tanks’.Labelled and coloured for reference with measurements reported, contains a key to symbols and colours in the lower right portion of the sheet.
